enterpriseGuide.description: Malangizo kwa oyang'anira kampani. Phunzirani kuyang'anira gulu lanu, kukhazikitsa maziko a chidziwitso, ndikuwongolera kuvomereza zomwe zili mkati.
enterpriseGuide.feature3: Mayendedwe Ogwira Ntchito Ovomerezeka ndi Zomwe Zili

userGuide.title: Buku Lotsogolera Ogwiritsa Ntchito
userGuide.description: Zonse zomwe mukufunikira kuti mupange, kusanthula, ndi kufalitsa zomwe zili mkati. Zabwino kwambiri kwa opanga zinthu ndi amalonda.
userGuide.feature1: Kupanga Zinthu ndi Zida Zopangira Zinthu

overview.intro: Monga woyang'anira nsanja, muli ndi mwayi wopeza zida zonse zowunikira ndikuwongolera nsanja yonse ya Contentry. Bukuli likuthandizani kumvetsetsa luso lanu loyang'anira.
overview.dashboardDesc: Dashboard ya Admin imapereka chithunzithunzi cha zochitika za papulatifomu ndi thanzi.
overview.feature1: Kuwunika zochitika za ogwiritsa ntchito nthawi yeniyeni
overview.feature3: Ziwerengero za thanzi la dongosolo ndi magwiridwe antchito
overview.feature4: Kufikira mwachangu ku ntchito zofunika kwambiri zoyang'anira
overview.tip: Pitani ku Admin Dashboard nthawi zonse kuti mudziwe zambiri za momwe zinthu zilili pa nsanjayi komanso kuzindikira mavuto omwe angakhalepo msanga.

userManagement.intro: Kuyang'anira ogwiritsa ntchito ndi ntchito yaikulu yoyang'anira yomwe imakulolani kuyang'anira ogwiritsa ntchito ndi mabizinesi onse papulatifomu.
userManagement.viewUsersDesc: Pitani ku gawo la User Management kuti muwone, fufuzani, ndikuwongolera ogwiritsa ntchito onse a nsanjayi.
userManagement.feature1: Sakani ndi kusefa ogwiritsa ntchito ndi dzina, imelo, kapena udindo
userManagement.feature2: Onani mbiri ya ogwiritsa ntchito mwatsatanetsatane ndi mbiri ya zochita zawo
userManagement.feature3: Sinthani maudindo ndi zilolezo za ogwiritsa ntchito
userManagement.feature4: Letsani kapena chotsani maakaunti a ogwiritsa ntchito ngati pakufunika kutero
userManagement.rolesDesc: Contentry ili ndi maudindo atatu akuluakulu a ogwiritsa ntchito:
userManagement.role1: Woyang'anira: Kufikira kwathunthu papulatifomu yokhala ndi kuthekera kokonza makina
userManagement.role2: Woyang'anira Makampani: Amayang'anira gulu la kampani yawo ndi makonda awo
userManagement.role3: Wogwiritsa Ntchito: Zinthu zokhazikika zopangira ndi kusanthula zomwe zili mkati
userManagement.warning: Nthawi zonse tsimikizirani momwe zinthu zilili musanasinthe maudindo a ogwiritsa ntchito kapena kuchotsa maakaunti. Zochita izi zitha kukhudza momwe gulu limagwirira ntchito.

analytics.intro: Kusanthula kumapereka chidziwitso chakuya cha momwe nsanjayi ikugwiritsidwira ntchito m'mabizinesi onse ndi ogwiritsa ntchito.
analytics.metric1: Ogwiritsa ntchito onse omwe akugwira ntchito komanso momwe zinthu zikuyendera pakukula
analytics.metric2: Kulemba ndi kusanthula zomwe zili mkati
analytics.metric4: Kusanthula kwa kagwiritsidwe ntchito ka zinthu
analytics.metric5: Kutsatira malamulo ndi zigoli zoopsa m'mabizinesi onse
analytics.tip: Tumizani malipoti owunikira kuti muwonetse zomwe anthu omwe akukhudzidwa nawo akupereka pogwiritsa ntchito gawo la Tsitsani Lipoti.

financials.intro: Gawo la Chidule cha Zachuma limapereka mawonekedwe a ndalama zomwe zapezeka pa nsanja ndi ziwerengero zolembetsa.
financials.revenueDesc: Yang'anirani momwe ndalama zikuyendera komanso momwe mabizinesi onse amagwirira ntchito.
financials.feature3: Kugwiritsa ntchito ngongole ndi mbiri ya kugula

systemConfig.intro: Kukhazikitsa dongosolo kumakupatsani mwayi wowongolera makonda ndi kuphatikiza kwa nsanja yonse.
systemConfig.integrationsDesc: Konzani ndikuyang'anira kuphatikiza kwa anthu ena:
systemConfig.integration1: Ayrshare API yofalitsa nkhani pa malo ochezera a pa Intaneti
systemConfig.integration2: Ntchito za AI zopangira ndi kusanthula zomwe zili mkati
systemConfig.tip: Yesani nthawi zonse zolumikizirana pamalo owonetsera zinthu musanasinthe makonda opanga.

gettingStarted.intro: Takulandirani ku Contentry! Monga Woyang'anira Makampani, muli ndi zida zoyendetsera gulu lanu, kukhazikitsa malangizo okhudzana ndi zomwe zili mkati, ndikuwonetsetsa kuti mtundu wa kampani ukugwirizana.
gettingStarted.setupDesc: Tsatirani njira izi kuti mukhazikitse akaunti yanu ya bizinesi:
gettingStarted.step1: Pitani ku Zikhazikiko > Bizinesi kuti mupeze dashboard ya kampani yanu
gettingStarted.step2: Tumizani malangizo ndi mfundo za kampani yanu ku Knowledge Base
gettingStarted.step3: Itanani mamembala a gulu lanu ndipo gawani maudindo oyenera
gettingStarted.step4: Konzani njira zovomerezeka zowunikira zomwe zili mkati
gettingStarted.tip: Malizitsani kukhazikitsa Knowledge Base yanu musanaitane mamembala a gulu kuti muwonetsetse kuti ali ndi mwayi wopeza malangizo a kampani kuyambira tsiku loyamba.

teamManagement.intro: Kuyang'anira bwino gulu kumatsimikizira mgwirizano wabwino komanso kuwongolera bwino mwayi wopeza zinthu mkati mwa bungwe lanu.
teamManagement.inviteDesc: Onjezani mamembala atsopano ku gulu lanu la bizinesi:
teamManagement.feature1: Lowetsani imelo ya membala wa gululo
teamManagement.feature2: Sankhani udindo wawo (Wopanga, Woyang'anira, kapena Woyang'anira)
teamManagement.feature3: Onjezani uthenga wosankha pa pempho lanu
teamManagement.role1: Wopanga: Angathe kupanga ndikutumiza zomwe zili kuti zivomerezedwe
teamManagement.role2: Woyang'anira: Angathe kuvomereza/kukana zomwe zili mkati ndikuwongolera opanga
teamManagement.role3: Woyang'anira: Kupeza mwayi wonse wa bizinesi kuphatikizapo kulipira ndi makonda
teamManagement.tip: Maitanidwe amatha ntchito patatha masiku 7. Kumbutsani mamembala a gulu kuti alandire maitanidwe awo mwachangu.

knowledgeBase.intro: Knowledge Base ndiye malo osungira malangizo a kampani yanu, mfundo, ndi malamulo okhudzana ndi zomwe zili mkati. Zikalata zomwe zayikidwa pano zimadziwitsa zomwe zimapangidwa ndi AI kwa mamembala onse a timu.
knowledgeBase.uploadDesc: Onjezani zikalata zomwe zingathandize kupanga zomwe zili:
knowledgeBase.docType1: Malangizo a kalembedwe ka kampani ndi malangizo a mawu
knowledgeBase.docType2: Malamulo ndi mfundo zotsatizana ndi malamulo
knowledgeBase.docType3: Malangizo okhudza kufalitsa nkhani pa malo ochezera a pa Intaneti
knowledgeBase.tip: Tumizani malangizo anu ofunikira kwambiri a kampani yanu poyamba. AI imaika patsogolo zikalata mu Knowledge Base ya kampani kuposa zomwe ogwiritsa ntchito amatumiza pawokha.

approvalWorkflow.intro: Njira yovomerezeka imatsimikizira kuti zonse zomwe zili mkati mwa kampani yanu zikugwirizana ndi miyezo ya kampani yanu musanazisindikize.
approvalWorkflow.processDesc: Zomwe zili mkati zimadutsa m'magawo awa:
approvalWorkflow.step1: Mlengi amapanga kapena kusanthula zomwe zili mkati
approvalWorkflow.step2: Zomwe zili mkati zimatumizidwa kuti zivomerezedwe (ngati pakufunika)
approvalWorkflow.step4: Zomwe zavomerezedwa zitha kusindikizidwa ku malo ochezera a pa Intaneti
approvalWorkflow.warning: Yambitsani zofunikira zovomerezeka mu Zikhazikiko kuti muwonetsetse kuti zonse zomwe zili mkati zawunikidwa musanazisindikize.

billing.intro: Konzani zolembetsa za bizinesi yanu ndikuyang'anira momwe ngongole zimagwiritsidwira ntchito.
billing.feature1: Tsatanetsatane wa dongosolo lamakono ndi kugawa ngongole
billing.feature2: Mbiri ya kagwiritsidwe ntchito ndi ma credits otsala
billing.feature3: Mbiri ya invoice ndi njira zolipirira

adminUsersPage.title: Kasamalidwe ka Ogwiritsa Ntchito
adminUsersPage.subtitle: Konzani ogwiritsa ntchito onse pa nsanja
adminUsersPage.searchPlaceholder: Sakani kudzera pa imelo kapena dzina...
adminUsersPage.confirmDelete: Kodi mukutsimikiza kuti mukufuna kuchotsa wogwiritsa ntchito uyu?

deleteModal.title: Chotsani Wogwiritsa Ntchito
deleteModal.description: Izi zichotsa kwamuyaya wogwiritsa ntchito ndi deta yonse yogwirizana nayo:

sections.socialAccounts: Maakaunti a Anthu Omwe Ali Pagulu

gettingStarted.intro: Takulandirani ku Contentry! Bukuli likuthandizani kupanga zinthu zokopa komanso zogwirizana ndi malamulo pogwiritsa ntchito zida zogwiritsa ntchito AI.
gettingStarted.step1: Konzani mbiri yanu ndi chidziwitso cholondola
gettingStarted.step2: Lumikizani maakaunti anu ochezera pa intaneti
gettingStarted.step3: Pangani Mbiri Yabwino ya Kampani Yanu kapena Kampeni Yanu
gettingStarted.step4: Pangani gawo lanu loyamba la zomwe zili mkati
gettingStarted.tip: Yambani ndi Ndondomeko Yabwino kuti muwonetsetse kuti zomwe mukulemba zikusunga kamvekedwe ndi mauthenga ofanana.

contentCreation.intro: Kupanga zinthu pogwiritsa ntchito nzeru zaukadaulo (AI) za Contentry kumakuthandizani kupanga zolemba zosangalatsa mumasekondi ochepa.
contentCreation.feature1: Lowetsani mutu kapena funso lofotokoza zomwe mukufuna kulemba
contentCreation.feature2: Sankhani nsanja zomwe mukufuna kugwiritsa ntchito (LinkedIn, Twitter, Facebook, ndi zina zotero)
contentCreation.feature4: Sankhani chithunzi chomwe chili pafupi nacho
contentCreation.schedulingDesc: Konzani kalendala yanu ya zomwe zili mkati:
contentCreation.schedule2: Sankhani masiku ndi nthawi yeniyeni yotumizira mauthenga okha
contentCreation.schedule3: Yambitsani kutumiza zokha kapena kuwunikira pamanja musanasindikize
contentCreation.tip: Gwiritsani ntchito bokosi loyang'ana la 'Zotsatsa' popanga zolemba zotsatsa kuti muwonetsetse kuti kusanthula kotsatira malamulo kumaganizira malangizo otsatsa.

analyzeContent.intro: Mbali ya Analyze Content imayang'ana zomwe zili mkati mwanu kuti zitsimikizire kuti zikutsatira malamulo, chikhalidwe, komanso kuti dzina lanu likugwirizana ndi zomwe zili mkati mwa kampani.
analyzeContent.howToDesc: Tumizani zomwe zili mkati kuti ziwunikidwe:
analyzeContent.step1: Pitani ku Kuwongolera Zomwe Zili M'kati > Kusanthula Zomwe Zili M'kati
analyzeContent.step2: Ikani zomwe zili mkati mwa lembalo
analyzeContent.step3: Sankhani Mbiri Yabwino Yogwirizana ndi Nkhani
analyzeContent.step4: Dinani Unikani kuti mulandire ndemanga mwatsatanetsatane
analyzeContent.type1: Kutsatira mfundo ndi malangizo a kampani
analyzeContent.type3: Kugwirizana kwa mawu ndi kamvekedwe ka chizindikiro
analyzeContent.tip: Nthawi zonse fufuzani zomwe zili mkati musanazifalitse ku nsanja zakunja, makamaka pa kampeni yolunjika madera osiyanasiyana.

strategicProfiles.intro: Ma Strategic Profiles amafotokoza nkhani, kamvekedwe, ndi malangizo opangira ndi kusanthula zomwe zili mkati.
strategicProfiles.feature1: Fotokozani omvera ndi cholinga cha mbiriyo
strategicProfiles.feature2: Konzani zinthu zokhudzana ndi chikhalidwe ndi madera
strategicProfiles.feature3: Kwezani zikalata ndi malangizo okhudzana ndi mbiri yanu
strategicProfiles.feature4: Konzani kamvekedwe ndi kalembedwe kanu kokhazikika
strategicProfiles.tip: Pangani Mapulojekiti Osiyanasiyana a Magulu, Ma Brand, kapena Misika Yachigawo Yosiyanasiyana.

socialAccounts.intro: Lumikizani maakaunti anu a pa malo ochezera a pa Intaneti kuti mufalitse nkhani mwachindunji kuchokera ku Contentry.
socialAccounts.platform1: LinkedIn - Masamba aumwini ndi a kampani
socialAccounts.warning: Sungani maulumikizidwe anu pa akaunti ya pa intaneti kukhala aposachedwa. Ma tokeni omwe atha ntchito angalepheretse zolemba zomwe zakonzedwa kuti zisafalitsidwe.

approvalProcess.intro: Ngati bizinesi yanu yalola kuti ntchito zovomerezeka zichitike, zomwe zili mkati mwake ziyenera kuwunikidwanso musanazisindikize.
approvalProcess.step1: Pangani kapena santhulani zomwe zili mkati mwanu
approvalProcess.step2: Dinani 'Tumizani Kuti Muvomereze' kuti mutumize kwa manejala wanu
approvalProcess.step3: Tsatirani momwe chivomerezo chilili pamzere wovomerezeka womwe ukudikira
approvalProcess.tip: Onjezani zolemba mukatumiza zomwe zili kuti mupatse ndemanga malingaliro okhudza zisankho zanu zolenga.

aboutGuide.title: Zokhudza & Machitidwe Abwino Kwambiri
aboutGuide.description: Dziwani tanthauzo la Contentry ndipo pezani njira zabwino kwambiri zokonzerera kupanga zinthu zanu, mapangano a mtundu wanu, ndi ma profiles a anthu otchuka.

sections.influencerProfiles: Mbiri za Anthu Okhudza Anthu Omwe Amawakhudza

whatIsContentry.intro: Contentry ndi nsanja yodziwira zinthu yomwe imagwiritsa ntchito AI yopangidwa kuti ithandize opanga zinthu, amalonda, ndi mabizinesi kupanga, kusanthula, ndikufalitsa zinthu zogwirizana ndi malamulo pamlingo waukulu. Kaya ndinu munthu wodziyimira pawokha kapena m'gulu lalikulu la otsatsa malonda, Contentry imapangitsa kuti ntchito yanu yokhudzana ndi zomwe zili mkati ikhale yosavuta.
whatIsContentry.missionDesc: Timakhulupirira kupatsa mphamvu opanga ndi zida zanzeru zomwe zimaonetsetsa kuti chilichonse chomwe chili patsamba lino chikugwirizana ndi mtundu wa kampani, chikhalidwe, komanso chikutsatira malangizo a nsanja.
whatIsContentry.benefit1: Kupanga zinthu pogwiritsa ntchito AI komwe kumagwirizana ndi mawu anu
whatIsContentry.benefit2: Kuyang'ana nthawi yeniyeni kuti mutsatire malamulo
whatIsContentry.benefit3: Kusanthula chikhalidwe cha anthu padziko lonse lapansi
whatIsContentry.benefit4: Njira zovomerezeka zogwirira ntchito zamagulu amakampani
whatIsContentry.tip: Kukhutira kumaphatikiza mphamvu ya AI ndi kuyang'aniridwa ndi anthu kuti apereke zomwe zimakopa omvera anu pamene akutsatira malamulo.

keyFeatures.intro: Contentry imapereka zida zambiri zoyendetsera moyo wanu wonse wa zomwe zili:
keyFeatures.aiContentDesc: Pangani zinthu zapamwamba zomwe zikugwirizana ndi mtundu wanu ndi omvera anu:
keyFeatures.aiFeature1: Kupanga zinthu pa nsanja zambiri (LinkedIn, Twitter, Facebook, Instagram)
keyFeatures.aiFeature2: Maonekedwe olembera omwe angasinthidwe (Aukadaulo, Osasinthasintha, Olimbikitsa)
keyFeatures.aiFeature3: Kupanga zithunzi za AI kuti zigwirizane ndi zolemba zanu
keyFeatures.complianceDesc: Onetsetsani kuti zomwe zili mkati mwanu zikukwaniritsa zofunikira zonse musanazisindikize:
keyFeatures.complianceFeature1: Kuyang'ana kokha kutsatira malamulo motsutsana ndi mfundo za kampani
keyFeatures.complianceFeature2: Kuwerengera kukhudzidwa ndi chikhalidwe kwa omvera apadziko lonse lapansi
keyFeatures.complianceFeature3: Kuwunika zoopsa ndi malangizo omwe angathandize
keyFeatures.tip: Gwiritsani ntchito Strategic Profiles kuti muwonetsetse kuti mawu a kampani ndi ofanana pa zonse zomwe zapangidwa.

bestPractices.intro: Kutsatira njira zabwino izi kudzakuthandizani kupeza zambiri kuchokera ku Contentry ndikupanga zomwe zikuyenda bwino:
bestPractices.workflowTitle: Khazikitsani Kayendedwe ka Ntchito ka Zomwe Zili M'kati
bestPractices.workflowDesc: Kugwira ntchito mokhazikika kumatsimikizira kuti ntchitoyo ndi yabwino komanso yothandiza:
bestPractices.workflow1: Yambani mwa kukhazikitsa Mbiri Yanu Yanzeru ndi malangizo a kampani
bestPractices.workflow2: Pangani zomwe zili ndi nsanja inayake ndi omvera m'maganizo
bestPractices.workflow3: Nthawi zonse santhulani zomwe zili mkati musanazisindikize ku nsanja zakunja
bestPractices.workflow4: Gwiritsani ntchito njira zokonzekera nthawi kuti musunge nthawi yolemba nthawi zonse
bestPractices.consistencyDesc: Kutsatsa kwa kampani nthawi zonse kumalimbitsa chidaliro ndi kuzindikira:
bestPractices.consistency1: Tumizani kalozera wanu wa kalembedwe ka mtundu wanu ku Knowledge Base
bestPractices.consistency2: Gwiritsani ntchito ndondomeko yofanana ya Strategic Profile pa misonkhano yokhudzana nayo
bestPractices.consistency3: Unikani zomwe zapangidwa ndi AI kuti muwonetsetse kuti zikugwirizana ndi mawu anu
bestPractices.warning: Nthawi zonse onaninso zomwe zapangidwa ndi AI musanazisindikize. Ngakhale kuti AI yathu ndi yamphamvu, kuyang'aniridwa ndi anthu kumatsimikizira zotsatira zabwino kwambiri.

optimizeContent.intro: Kupanga zinthu zabwino ndi chiyambi chabe. Umu ndi momwe mungakonzere bwino kuti anthu azisangalala kwambiri:
optimizeContent.platformDesc: Nsanja iliyonse ili ndi zofunikira zapadera komanso zomwe omvera amayembekezera:
optimizeContent.platform1: LinkedIn: Yang'anani pa chidziwitso cha akatswiri, gwiritsani ntchito mawu ofunikira amakampani, nthawi yayitali yovomerezeka
optimizeContent.platform2: Twitter/X: Mauthenga achidule, gwiritsani ntchito ma hashtag mwanzeru, kambiranani ndi mitu yomwe ikutchuka
optimizeContent.platform3: Facebook: Zinthu zooneka bwino zimagwira ntchito bwino, zimalimbikitsa kutenga nawo mbali pagulu
optimizeContent.platform4: Instagram: Zithunzi zapamwamba ndizofunikira, gwiritsani ntchito ma hashtag oyenera, Nkhani zoti mugwiritse ntchito
optimizeContent.engagement1: Tumizani nthawi zonse pa nthawi yoyenera kwa omvera anu
optimizeContent.engagement2: Gwiritsani ntchito mawu olimbikitsa oti muchitepo kanthu mu zomwe muli nazo
optimizeContent.engagement3: Yankhani ndemanga ndipo lankhulani ndi anthu ammudzi mwanu
optimizeContent.engagement4: Tsatirani kusanthula kuti mumvetse zomwe zili bwino kwambiri
optimizeContent.tip: Gwiritsani ntchito njira yokonzekera nthawi ya Contentry kuti mutumize uthenga nthawi yoyenera popanda kugwiritsa ntchito manja.

brandDeals.intro: Mgwirizano wa makampani ukhoza kukhala njira yopezera ndalama zambiri. Umu ndi momwe mungakonzere bwino njira yanu:
brandDeals.prep1: Sungani mbiri yanu yaukadaulo komanso yokhazikika
brandDeals.prep2: Tsatirani ndikuwonetsa ziwerengero zanu zokhudzana ndi kudzipereka kwanu
brandDeals.prep3: Pangani zida zojambulira ndi anthu anu komanso kufikira kwanu
brandDeals.prep4: Gwiritsani ntchito Contentry kuti mupange zitsanzo za malingaliro azinthu zomwe zili ndi dzina lodziwika bwino
brandDeals.pitchingDesc: Pangani mavoti anu kukhala omveka bwino:
brandDeals.pitch1: Gwirizanitsani nkhani yanu ndi mfundo za kampani yanu komanso omvera anu
brandDeals.pitch2: Perekani malingaliro enieni okhudza zomwe zili m'nkhaniyo osati malingaliro wamba
brandDeals.pitch3: Phatikizani kusanthula kotsatira malamulo kuti muwonetsetse kuti zomwe zili mkati mwanu zikugwirizana ndi malangizo
brandDeals.tip: Gwiritsani ntchito njira yowunikira malamulo a Contentry popanga zomwe zathandizidwa kuti muwonetsetse kuti zofunikira za FTC ndi kuwulula zomwe zili papulatifomu zakwaniritsidwa.

influencerProfiles.intro: Mbiri Yanu Yanzeru ndiye maziko a njira yanu yopezera zomwe mukufuna. Umu ndi momwe mungakonzere bwino:
influencerProfiles.setupDesc: Mbiri yokonzedwa bwino imatsimikizira kuti zinthu zili bwino komanso zogwirizana ndi kampani:
influencerProfiles.setup1: Fotokozani momveka bwino niche yanu ndi omvera anu
influencerProfiles.setup2: Konzani kalembedwe ndi kalembedwe komwe mumakonda
influencerProfiles.setup3: Onjezani zinthu zokhudzana ndi chikhalidwe ndi madera kwa omvera anu
influencerProfiles.setup4: Kwezani zikalata zofotokozera zomwe zimafotokoza bwino dzina la kampani yanu
influencerProfiles.optimizeDesc: Konzani mbiri yanu nthawi zonse kuti mupeze zotsatira zabwino:
influencerProfiles.optimize1: Unikani zomwe zapangidwa ndikusintha makonda a mbiri yanu ngati pakufunika kutero
influencerProfiles.optimize2: Pangani ma profiles angapo a makampeni kapena omvera osiyanasiyana
influencerProfiles.optimize3: Sungani Chidziwitso Chanu Chosinthidwa ndi Malangizo Aposachedwa a Brand
influencerProfiles.tip: Unikani mbiri yanu ya Strategic Profile kotala lililonse kuti muwonetsetse kuti ikuwonetsa mtundu wanu womwe ukusintha komanso omvera anu.

workflowsGuide.title: Kayendedwe ka Ntchito ndi Buku Lothandizira Kulemba Zigoli
workflowsGuide.description: Phunzirani momwe dongosolo lopezera zigoli limagwirira ntchito ndikumvetsetsa gawo lililonse la ntchito kuyambira kusanthula zomwe zili mkati mpaka kuvomerezedwa.

scoring.intro: Dongosolo la zigoli mu Contentry limapereka zigoli zomveka bwino komanso zozikidwa pa chilango kuti zikuthandizeni kumvetsetsa momwe zomwe zili mkati mwanu zimagwirira ntchito. Zigoli zonse zimayambira pa 100 ndipo mfundo zimachotsedwa pa zolakwa zinazake kapena mavuto omwe apezeka.
scoring.overallScoreDesc: Chiwerengero chonse ndi kuphatikiza kolemera kwa zinthu zonse zosanthula, kuyambira 0 mpaka 100:
scoring.scoreRange1: 80-100: Zabwino Kwambiri - Zokonzeka kusindikizidwa, zomwe zili mkati mwake zakonzedwa bwino kwambiri
scoring.scoreRange2: 60-79: Zabwino - Zosintha zazing'ono zomwe zalimbikitsidwa musanasindikize
scoring.scoreRange3: 40-59: Ikufunika Kusamalidwa - Kuwunikanso ndi kusintha kukufunika
scoring.scoreRange4: 0-39: Yalembedwa chizindikiro - Mavuto akuluakulu, musawafalitse mpaka atathetsedwa
scoring.overallCalcDesc: Chiwerengero chonsecho chimagwiritsa ntchito kulemera kosinthika kutengera mulingo wa chiopsezo:
scoring.overallCalc4: Chiwopsezo Choopsa (Kutsatira malamulo ≤40): Zigoli zonse zokhazikika pamlingo wapamwamba wa 40
scoring.componentsDesc: Zigoli zanu zonse zimawerengedwa kuchokera ku zigawo zitatu zofunika pogwiritsa ntchito njira yogwiritsira ntchito chilango:
scoring.component1: Chiwerengero Chotsatira Malamulo: Chimayamba pa 100, chimachotsa mfundo pa kuphwanya malamulo komwe kwapezeka
scoring.component2: Chiwerengero cha Kukhudzidwa ndi Chikhalidwe: Avereji ya miyeso 6 ya chikhalidwe cha Hofstede
scoring.component3: Chiyerekezo Cholondola: Chimayamba pa 100, chimachotsa mfundo pa cholakwika chilichonse kapena vuto lililonse lomwe lapezeka
scoring.complianceDetailDesc: Positi iliyonse imayamba ndi Chigoli cha Kutsatira Malamulo cha 100. Mapointi amachotsedwa pa kuphwanya kulikonse:
scoring.complianceSeverity1: Kuphwanya malamulo kofunikira (-60 pts): kuphwanya malamulo a NDA, kuulula zambiri zachinsinsi → Kuopsa kothetsa ntchito nthawi yomweyo
scoring.complianceSeverity2: Kuphwanya malamulo mwamphamvu (-40 pts): Kuzunza, kusankhana, kulankhula za chidani → Kuopsa kwa milandu
scoring.complianceSeverity3: Kuphwanya malamulo kwakukulu (-25 pts): Kusowa kwa kulengeza malonda, kuphwanya malamulo → Chiwopsezo cha chindapusa/kuyimitsidwa
scoring.complianceSeverity4: Kuphwanya malamulo pang'ono (-10 pts): Kamvekedwe kosayenera, kusintha pang'ono kwa malangizo → Maphunziro/chenjezo
scoring.complianceSeverity5: Chitsanzo: Kusowa #ad (-25) + Vuto la kamvekedwe (-10) = Zigoli zomaliza za 65
scoring.complianceAdjustment: Kuphwanya malamulo angapo - chilango chilichonse chimagwiritsidwa ntchito mophatikizana
scoring.complianceViolationTypes: Kuphwanya malamulo: Chidziwitso chachinsinsi, Kuzunza, Kuphwanya malamulo a NDA, Kusowa kuulula, Kuphwanya malamulo, Kalankhulidwe kosayenera
scoring.culturalDetailDesc: Ziwerengero za chikhalidwe ndi avareji ya miyeso isanu ndi umodzi yovomerezeka ya chikhalidwe cha Hofstede (0-100 iliyonse):
scoring.culturalDim1: Kutalikirana ndi Mphamvu: Kutsatira malamulo, kulemekeza ulamuliro motsutsana ndi kufanana, kamvekedwe kosasamala
scoring.culturalDim2: Kudziyimira pawokha motsutsana ndi Kugwirizana: Kuyang'ana pa 'Ine/Ine' motsutsana ndi 'Ife/Ife' pagulu
scoring.culturalDim3: Umuna ndi Ukazi: Chilankhulo chopikisana/chodzidalira ndi chogwirizana/chogwirizana
scoring.culturalDim4: Kupewa Kusatsimikizika: Malamulo, chitetezo, kutsindika momveka bwino motsutsana ndi kutseguka ku kusamveka bwino
scoring.culturalDim5: Kuyang'ana Kwanthawi Yaitali: Kuyang'ana pa mphoto zamtsogolo poyerekeza ndi phindu la nthawi yochepa
scoring.culturalDim6: Kudzikhutiritsa ndi Kudziletsa: Chiyembekezo/chisangalalo ndi chilankhulo chodziletsa/cholamulirika
scoring.culturalRisk: Ngati Cultural Score yatsika pansi pa 50, 'Reputation Risk' imagwiritsidwa ntchito kuteteza mtundu wanu kwa omvera padziko lonse lapansi.
scoring.accuracyDetailDesc: Positi iliyonse imayamba ndi Chiyerekezo Cholondola cha 100. Mapointi amachotsedwa pamavuto omwe apezeka:
scoring.accuracyCheck1: Zolakwika/Zambiri Zolakwika (-40 pts): Zonena zabodza, deta yabodza
scoring.accuracyCheck2: Gwero Losadalirika (-20 pts): Zonena kuchokera ku magwero osadalirika
scoring.accuracyCheck3: Chigamulo Chosatsimikizika (-10 pts): Mawu omwe sangatsimikizidwe kuti ndi zoona
scoring.accuracyCheck4: Chitsanzo: Bodza (-40) + Gwero losatsimikizika (-20) = Chigoli chomaliza cha 40
scoring.accuracyCalc: Nkhani zambiri zimayikidwa pamodzi - chilango chilichonse chimagwiritsidwa ntchito mophatikizana
scoring.flagStatusDesc: Zomwe zili mkati zimayikidwa chizindikiro chokha kutengera zotsatira za kusanthula:
scoring.flag1: Nkhani Yabwino (Yobiriwira): Zigoli zoposa 80 - zokonzeka kufalitsidwa
scoring.flag2: Akufunika Kusamalidwa (Achikasu): Zigoli 60-79 - kusintha pang'ono kumalimbikitsidwa
scoring.flag3: Yalembedwa kuti Iwunikenso (Lalanje): Zigoli 40-59 - kuwunikanso kumafunika musanasindikize
scoring.flag4: Mavuto Ovuta (Ofiira): Zigoli zosakwana 40 - musasindikize mpaka zitathetsedwa
scoring.disclosure1: Ndi Zotsatsa: Zimazindikira ngati zomwe zili mkati ndi zotsatsa kapena zothandizidwa
scoring.disclosure2: Ali ndi Kuulula: Kufufuza za #zotsatsa, #zothandizidwa, kapena kuulula mgwirizano koyenera
scoring.disclosure3: Kutsatira Malamulo a Chigawo: Kutsimikizira zofunikira pakuwulula za FTC (US), EU, ndi Norway
scoring.disclosure4: Kusowa kwa kuulula kumayambitsa kuphwanya kwakukulu (-25 points) pa Compliance Score
scoring.tip: Zigoli zimawerengedwanso nthawi iliyonse yomwe zomwe zili mkati zimasanthulidwa. Gwiritsani ntchito mawonekedwe a Rewrite kuti muwongolere zokha zomwe zili ndi zigoli zochepa pamene mukusunga uthenga wanu.

analyze.intro: Kayendetsedwe ka ntchito ka Analyze Content kamakuthandizani kuwunika zomwe zilipo kuti muwone ngati zikugwirizana ndi malamulo, chikhalidwe, komanso khalidwe lake musanazisindikize.
analyze.stepsDesc: Tsatirani njira izi kuti mufufuze zomwe zili mkati mwanu:
analyze.step1: Pitani ku tabu ya Content Intelligence > Santhulani Content
analyze.step2: Ikani kapena lembani zomwe zili mkati mwa lembalo
analyze.step3: Sankhani Mbiri Yabwino Yogwiritsira Ntchito Kuti Mugwiritse Ntchito Malangizo Anu
analyze.step4: Sankhani 'Pangani chithunzi chomwe chikutsagana nanu' ngati mukufuna kuti AI ipange chithunzi chowoneka bwino
analyze.type1: Kuwunika Kutsatira Malamulo: Kutsimikizira zomwe zili mkati mwake motsutsana ndi mfundo ndi malamulo a nsanja (FTC, GDPR)
analyze.type2: Kusamala Chikhalidwe: Kusanthula zinthu zomwe zingakhale zonyansa kapena zosakhudza chikhalidwe
analyze.type3: Kutsimikizira Zolondola: Kumayang'ana zomwe akunena ndi zoona zake kuti zitsimikizire kulondola
analyze.type4: Kugwirizana kwa Brand: Kuyerekeza zomwe zili mkati ndi malangizo anu a Strategic Profile
analyze.tip: Gwiritsani ntchito batani la 'Lembaninso' kuti muwongolere zokha zomwe zili pansi pa 70. Luso laukadaulo lochita kupanga (AI) lidzathetsa mavuto omwe atchulidwa pamene likusunga uthenga wanu.

generate.intro: Njira yogwiritsira ntchito Generate Content imagwiritsa ntchito AI kupanga zinthu zatsopano kutengera mutu wanu, zofunikira pa nsanja, ndi malangizo a mtundu.
generate.step1: Pitani ku tabu ya Content Intelligence > Content Generation
generate.step2: Lowetsani mutu wanu kapena fotokozani zomwe mukufuna kupanga
generate.step3: Sankhani nsanja yanu (mapulatifomu) ndi kalembedwe kake kolembera
generate.step4: Sankhani Mbiri Yabwino Kwambiri kuti mtundu wanu ukhale wogwirizana
generate.step5: Dinani 'Pangani' kuti mupange zomwe zili ndi AI
generate.optionsDesc: Sinthani zomwe mwapanga ndi zosankha izi:
generate.option1: Kusankha Nsanja: Sankhani nsanja imodzi kapena zingapo (LinkedIn, Twitter, Facebook, Instagram)
generate.option2: Kalembedwe ka Kulemba: Sankhani kuchokera ku Professional, Casual, Inspirative, kapena Informationative
generate.option3: Utali wa Zamkati: Sinthani kutalika kwa zomwe mukufuna kuti mukwaniritse zomwe mukufuna
generate.option4: Kupanga Zithunzi: Yatsani kuti mupange chithunzi chopangidwa ndi AI chomwe chili pafupi nacho
generate.tip: Zomwe zapangidwa zimasanthulidwa zokha pambuyo popangidwa. Unikaninso zigolizo ndikugwiritsa ntchito mabatani a ndemanga kuti mupangenso ngati pakufunika.

schedulePrompt.intro: Ndondomeko Yokonzekera imakulolani kukhazikitsa kupanga zinthu zokha zomwe zimayenda nthawi zinazake, kusunga kalendala yanu yonse popanda kuchitapo kanthu pamanja.
schedulePrompt.howToDesc: Pangani malangizo omwe amatulutsa zokha zomwe zili mkati:
schedulePrompt.step1: Pangani chidziwitso chanu chopanga zomwe zili ndi mutu ndi zomwe mumakonda
schedulePrompt.step2: Khazikitsani kuchuluka kwa nthawi yochitira (tsiku ndi tsiku, sabata iliyonse, kapena masiku enieni)
schedulePrompt.step3: Sankhani nthawi yomwe zinthu ziyenera kupangidwa
schedulePrompt.step4: Yambitsani 'Kusanthula Kokha' kuti muyambe kusanthula zomwe zapangidwa zokha
schedulePrompt.benefit1: Sungani zolemba zanu mosalekeza popanda ntchito yamanja ya tsiku ndi tsiku
schedulePrompt.benefit2: Pangani zomwe zili mkati mwa maola abwino kwambiri opanga zinthu
schedulePrompt.benefit3: Pangani zolemba zakale kuti ziwunikidwe ndikuvomerezedwa
schedulePrompt.tip: Malangizo okonzedwa amapanga zomwe zili muzolemba zanu. Unikaninso ndikuvomereza musanazisindikize kuti muwonetsetse kuti zili bwino.

schedulePost.intro: Konzani Nthawi Yolemba Imelo imakulolani kuti muyike zinthu zovomerezeka pamzere kuti zifalitsidwe zokha panthawi yoyenera pa malo anu ochezera a pa Intaneti.
schedulePost.step1: Kuchokera pa zomwe zili mkati, dinani 'Konzani' m'malo mwa 'Sindikizani Tsopano'
schedulePost.step2: Sankhani tsiku ndi nthawi yoti musindikize
schedulePost.step3: Sankhani malo ochezera olumikizidwa omwe mukufuna kufalitsa
schedulePost.option1: Nthawi Yeniyeni: Sankhani tsiku ndi nthawi yeniyeni yofalitsira
schedulePost.option2: Nthawi Yabwino Kwambiri: Lolani AI ipereke nthawi zabwino kwambiri zotumizira kutengera deta yokhudzana ndi kutenga nawo mbali
schedulePost.option3: Mapulatifomu Ambiri: Konzani zomwe zili zomwezo pamapulatifomu ambiri nthawi imodzi
schedulePost.warning: Mauthenga okonzedwa amafunika akaunti imodzi yolumikizidwa ya malo ochezera a pa Intaneti. Lumikizani maakaunti mu Zikhazikiko > Mbiri za Anthu Ocheza Nawo.

approval.intro: Njira Yovomerezeka imaonetsetsa kuti zomwe zili mkati ndi zabwino mwa kufuna kuti oyang'anira aziwunikanso musanazisindikize. Izi ndizofunikira makamaka kwa magulu amakampani ndi mafakitale olamulidwa.
approval.processDesc: Momwe zomwe zili mkati mwake zimayendera mu ndondomeko yovomerezeka:
approval.step1: Mlengi amatumiza zomwe zili mkati mwanu podina 'Lembani Kuti Muvomerezedwe'
approval.step2: Zomwe zili mkati zikuwonekera mu mzere wovomerezeka wa manejala
approval.step3: Woyang'anira akuwunikanso zomwe zili, zigoli, ndi zotsatira zosanthula
approval.step4: Woyang'anira avomereza, akupempha kusintha, kapena kukana zomwe zili mkati
approval.status1: Choyambirira: Zomwe zili mkati zikukonzedwa, sizinatumizidwebe
approval.status2: Kudikira Kuvomerezedwa: Kutumizidwa ndikuyembekezera kuwunikanso kwa manejala
approval.status3: Yavomerezedwa: Yokonzeka kufalitsidwa kapena kukonzedwa nthawi
approval.status4: Kukonzanso Zosowa: Woyang'anira wapempha kusintha - onani ndemanga ndikutumizanso
approval.tip: Onjezani zolemba mukatumiza zomwe zili kuti owunikira apereke malingaliro okhudza zisankho zanu zaluso. Izi zimathandizira kuti njira yovomerezera ichitike mwachangu.

twoFactorAuth.setupInstructions: Sikani khodi iyi ya QR ndi pulogalamu yanu yotsimikizira
twoFactorAuth.backupCodesDescription: Sungani ma code awa pamalo otetezeka. Mutha kuwagwiritsa ntchito kuti mulowe mu akaunti yanu ngati mutataya chotsimikizira chanu.

gdpr.cookieDescription: Timagwiritsa ntchito ma cookies kuti tiwonjezere zomwe mumagwiritsa ntchito posakatula, kupereka zomwe zili ndi zosowa zanu, komanso kusanthula kuchuluka kwa anthu omwe timawagwiritsa ntchito. Mukadina "Landirani Zonse", mukuvomereza kugwiritsa ntchito ma cookies athu. Mutha kusintha zomwe mumakonda kapena kukana ma cookies osafunikira.
gdpr.essentialCookiesDesc: Zofunikira pa kutsimikizira, chitetezo, ndi magwiridwe antchito oyambira. Sizingalepheretsedwe.
gdpr.analyticsCookiesDesc: Tithandizeni kumvetsetsa momwe alendo amagwirira ntchito ndi nsanja yathu kuti akonze mautumiki athu.
gdpr.marketingCookiesDesc: Amagwiritsidwa ntchito popereka zotsatsa zomwe zimagwirizana ndi zosowa za anthu ena komanso kuyeza momwe kampeni ikuyendera.
